did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Summary: Reports, correspondence, and statistics, relating to the financing of the Russian war effort during World War I.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Mikhail Vladimirovich Bernatskii Miscellany, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

did.unittitle: Monthly records of state revenue and expenditures, up to July 1917
List of extraordinary credits for war expense exceeding the budget scheme, up to 15 January 1918
Report concerning the operations of credit during the war
Note containing information about Russian State operations of credit in the United States during the war
Secret correspondence between the Director of the Chancellery of Credit and the Financial Attachi in London with reference to the upholding rate of the rouble in Persia
United balance of the private institutes of credit, up to 30 September, 1917
Items referring to investment of shares societies, 1913-1917
Telegrams of the Russian Ambassador in Washington
Material concerning the indebtedness of Russia in foreign countries, up to 8 October 1917
Balance of the Foreign Trade of Russia, up to 15 October 1917
Subscription to the Liberty Loan, up to 20 September 1917
Deposits and their movement at the State Savings-Banks, up to 19 August, 1917
Financial Agreement between the British and Russian Governments supplementary to the agreement of 30 September, 1915 and 27 October 1916 (in English)
Schemes of Coffee monopoly, presented by the Provisional Government of Russia, up to 20 October 1917
